Review.Title: It was pretty good. I don't eat many bars...
Review.ReviewText: It was pretty good. I don't eat many bars like that, so it was nice to be able to try it before buying it.

Review.Title: Hands down, my favorite, on-the-go, healthy snack is a...
Review.ReviewText: Hands down, my favorite, on-the-go, healthy snack is a LARABAR. When I opened my box to find the chocolate chip cookie dough bar I shrieked! Literally.

Review.Title: I will be honest...this tasted horrible. I was excited...
Review.ReviewText: I will be honest...this tasted horrible. I was excited to receive it, since I am currently on a program in which I eat no white bread, white pasta or sugar. I thought this bar would be a perfect evening snack. It tastes gross.

Review.Title: I didn't like the flavor but it was one...
Review.ReviewText: I didn't like the flavor but it was one I haven't tried before.

Review.Title: love larabar's. I buy them almost every time I...
Review.ReviewText: love larabar's. I buy them almost every time I go grocery shopping.

Review.Title: I love food samples especially if they are all...
Review.ReviewText: I love food samples especially if they are all natural or organic. I am currently switching my food intake to all natural and organic. This is a nice way to get a nice snack/chocolate in without having to stray from goals. Thank you, I really liked it!

Review.Title: I love LARABAR! I ate it as soon as...
Review.ReviewText: I love LARABAR! I ate it as soon as I opened the box and I always enjoy trying new flavors, even though I already buy them.

Review.Title: This is the first edible "extra" that I didn't...
Review.ReviewText: This is the first edible "extra" that I didn't like. The taste wasn't very good (I had the coconut cream pie one- sounded promising) and the texture was repulsive. At least I know never to purchase one of these bars in the future! :)

Review.Title: Love the full size. May have to check out...
Review.ReviewText: Love the full size. May have to check out the minis.

Review.Title: It was nasty!! It tasted like uncooked muffin batter...
Review.ReviewText: It was nasty!! It tasted like uncooked muffin batter and a little bit of soap

Review.Title: I sampled them in my voxbox already do not...
Review.ReviewText: I sampled them in my voxbox already do not like the taste.

Review.Title: Love the chocolate/coconut bars! This one was nice as...
Review.ReviewText: Love the chocolate/coconut bars! This one was nice as well.

Review.Title: I def didn't like the flavor. I tried giving...
Review.ReviewText: I def didn't like the flavor. I tried giving it to my husband who also didn't like the flavor. I then tried giving it to my son, he spit it out.

Review.Title: I tried these before through the Influenster program and...
Review.ReviewText: I tried these before through the Influenster program and didn't like it then. I had a different flavor, so I was still open to trying this flavor which was Chocolate Chip Brownie. It wasn't as bad as Cashew Cookie but I didn't finish eating it after the first bite. So gross.

Review.Title: I've never tried this food product before and it...
Review.ReviewText: I've never tried this food product before and it was a nice surprise in my birchbox this month. I opened it and tried it right away. I got the carrot cake flavor. It didn't taste like carrot cake to me but I could taste the different fruit and nuts in it. Def interesting and not too bad. Might try to buy in the future.

Review.Title: tastes pretty good but i don't know that i...
Review.ReviewText: tastes pretty good but i don't know that i would buy it regularly as there are some healthier or less caloric options out there

Review.Title: I love the regular sized LARABAR bars, especially in...
Review.ReviewText: I love the regular sized LARABAR bars, especially in the key lime pie flavor, so when I got the mini bar it was a nice surprise! I would have liked to try any other flavor than the peanut butter cookie, but its a great product overall!

Review.Title: I lvoe larabars I have sampled them at a...
Review.ReviewText: I lvoe larabars I have sampled them at a few different places. they taste fantastic there are so many different flavors and I havent tried one I didn't like yet.

Review.Title: I enjoyed it, but I look forward to the...
Review.ReviewText: I enjoyed it, but I look forward to the beauty products more than the health supplement items.

Review.Title: This was such a tasty little surprise! After looking...
Review.ReviewText: This was such a tasty little surprise! After looking at what other flavors are available, I definitely want to try more of these. The bar was very soft, and it wasn't too sweet. I could also taste each of the ingredients, and I liked how the nuts added texture, but they weren't hard to bite into. The size is definitely a bonus, and since I oftentimes rely on granola bar-type foods as a meal (it's bad, I know), I like that I can put a couple of these in my bag and know that I won't starve while working long days.

Review.Title: Because of my Crohn's Disease I was unable to...
Review.ReviewText: Because of my Crohn's Disease I was unable to eat this and gave it to my husband, so I saw no point in having this as well as a lot of the food that is put in the boxes.

Review.Title: My Birchbox came on a day when I skipped...
Review.ReviewText: My Birchbox came on a day when I skipped breakfast so I was very happy to find the LARABAR inside. The bar is gooey and feels raw, and it actually tastes like health food. If you're into that sort of thing, I'd say it's good, but I can imagine a lot of people not liking it so much. For me, the texture put me off a bit, but I thought it was the perfect small breakfast replacement on a busy day.

Review.Title: I got the chocolate brownie flavor. quite tasty. I've...
Review.ReviewText: I got the chocolate brownie flavor. quite tasty. I've purchased the full size ones at the grocery but never seen the mini. Would make a good small afternoon or before workout snack.

Review.Title: It tasted wholesome and great. It was the perfect...
Review.ReviewText: It tasted wholesome and great. It was the perfect pick up during the mid day grog.

Review.Title: I got the chocolate peanut butter flavor and it...
Review.ReviewText: I got the chocolate peanut butter flavor and it was simply delicious! When I finished my sample I wished I hadn't eaten it so fast and had more of it to eat!

Review.Title: I received the Blueberry Muffin one. I was excited...
Review.ReviewText: I received the Blueberry Muffin one. I was excited to try it, and disappointed with the taste. It was mushy and had an odd taste. I wish I got to try a chocolate one instead, I'm sure it would have been better.

Review.Title: I prefer Beauty products, but I appreciate that the...
Review.ReviewText: I prefer Beauty products, but I appreciate that the bar is at least a healthier snack alternative. I thought it was creative of Birchbox to put the bars in the box because many ppl this time of year are trying to lose weight. The flavor is average but not too bad for a 'healthy' snack

Review.Title: I didn't like the taste and texture of the...
Review.ReviewText: I didn't like the taste and texture of the sample I received (brownie). I took a bite of it and had to spit it out! Sorry :-(

Review.Title: Will be a nice change to mix up with...
Review.ReviewText: Will be a nice change to mix up with my Luna bars.

Review.Title: My daughter absolutely loved the Larabar! I didn't get...
Review.ReviewText: My daughter absolutely loved the Larabar! I didn't get a chance to try the bar because once my daughter saw it, she tore it open and ate the whole bar. I will definitely buy at least another bar to try for myself.

Review.Title: I have combo skin and work out quite a...
Review.ReviewText: I have combo skin and work out quite a bit which causes me to break out. the sooner i can get the oil off my face the better.

Review.Title: I loved these! Way better than my previously purchased...
Review.ReviewText: I loved these! Way better than my previously purchased Clean and Clear blotting sheets. Smells awesome.

Review.Title: They are great for bathroom touchups at work when...
Review.ReviewText: They are great for bathroom touchups at work when you don't want to bring your whole makeup bag to the bathroom with you. It's good at getting rid of shine and excess oil!

Review.Title: I love these blotting papers. I have really oily...
Review.ReviewText: I love these blotting papers. I have really oily skin, especially in the summer, so these were a lifesaver for me! The packaging was really cute, I like the slim envelope because it can fit anywhere! I also really liked how the papers smell; they smell lightly of green tea which I think is a really refeshing scent. They worked really well to mattify my face, especially my t-zone area which gets really oily during the day.

Review.Title: The theory is great, but the actuality isn't practical...
Review.ReviewText: The theory is great, but the actuality isn't practical. Aside from the fact that I wouldn't wear these (perhaps 7 or so years ago when I lived in NYC I would've gone for the red fishnet or midnight glitterati -- but now I'm a 40-something living in South Florida.....), they're VERY difficult to apply. "Practice makes perfect" -- sure, but who wants to waste $5 each time you get it wrong? Trying to cut them to size, smooth out unintentional wrinkles & bubbles, etc is just more trouble than it's worth. Though I would recommend them to someone who is steadier in hand than me & who likes extreme club looks (like I USED to....)

Review.Title: Not my thing at all. Plus leopard print is...
Review.ReviewText: Not my thing at all. Plus leopard print is not something I wear, not a fan.

Review.Title: I got a reallly silly color for "violent lips...
Review.ReviewText: I got a reallly silly color for "violent lips", a subtle pink hahahaha! I won't even try it cuz it would be a waste of my time, it woulda been nice to get a pattern. Thanks Birchbox :(

Review.Title: I dont know anyone who would wear this expect...
Review.ReviewText: I dont know anyone who would wear this expect celebs like katy perry.

Review.Title: I saw these on sale at Sephora, so maybe...
Review.ReviewText: I saw these on sale at Sephora, so maybe it sounded like a cute idea, but didn't quite take off. I don't know where you could wear these except maybe to a Goth party, which I'm not into.

Review.Title: Did not like this at all and my husband...
Review.ReviewText: Did not like this at all and my husband made a gagging noise when he saw them.

Review.Title: This would be great if it was closer to...
Review.ReviewText: This would be great if it was closer to Halloween. Is this suppose to be fun and sexy? There's nothing fun or sexy to flaky tattooed peeling lips.

Review.Title: I was kind of on the fence about this...
Review.ReviewText: I was kind of on the fence about this because it's just so odd, but such a good idea! Most of the designs aren't something I would exactly wear every day, but they are definitely fun and I like that they last so long.

Review.Title: I think there cool, but im in middle school...
Review.ReviewText: I think there cool, but im in middle school. when am i ever going to wear hot pink cheetah print lips?

Review.Title: Seriously, Birchbox? This is the most ridiculous thing I...
Review.ReviewText: Seriously, Birchbox? This is the most ridiculous thing I have ever seen. The only time that these absurd lip tattoos would ever be appropriate would be if I dressed up as a clown. Bad, bad, BAD!

Review.Title: I'm all about trying new things in fashion and...
Review.ReviewText: I'm all about trying new things in fashion and beauty, but a lip tattoo?! I've never heard of these before, even though Birchbox claims they're the "hottest new trend." These are just waaaayyyy too out there for me.

Review.Title: I will be wearing this to the Hunger Games...
Review.ReviewText: I will be wearing this to the Hunger Games opening night!

Review.Title: These gave me such a hard time, it was...
Review.ReviewText: These gave me such a hard time, it was helpful having watched the video and having the tip for trimming, but despite my best attempts I couldn't get them cut evenly and with my lip pieced I was forced to cut an extra slit for the jewelry which when I put them on made it rip in half I got my lips stuck shut as well... and when they dried it made it feel like wrinkling paper on my mouth and made it uncomfortable to talk... other than the rips and the fact that they were uneven from my cutting job and had to have fill ins with a lip pencil, I thought they looked rather nice... but I don't think I could stand wearing them for anything short of a photo shoot since not talking doesn't work for me as a mother... and getting them off is really not fun... my lips were rubbed raw!

Review.Title: This was fun to use, but it's a little...
Review.ReviewText: This was fun to use, but it's a little too crazy for me to buy more of them. I like fun lipstick, but I prefer it to be a little more subtle.

Review.Title: I was disappointed when I found this in my...
Review.ReviewText: I was disappointed when I found this in my February box. I like trying trends, but I feel like this is just impractical. I'm trying to find someone to give it to so it doesn't go to waste.

Review.Title: The concept SOUNDS clever, but it turns out this...
Review.ReviewText: The concept SOUNDS clever, but it turns out this whole process involves WAY more trimming, adjusting, blotting, etc. than it's worth. Glitter lipstick would've been 10 seconds. These tattoo things? Like, five minutes, and could never get them right. Who would bother and why?

Review.Title: They're very messy to me and do not stay...
Review.ReviewText: They're very messy to me and do not stay on very well even with the recommendations of not eating and moisturizing. I would just rather wear lipstick and have to keep applying it. It's a fun idea and it will be fun to play with these for girls night's in but I would not consider wearing them out in pulic

Review.Title: these would be fun for halloween, but in my...
Review.ReviewText: these would be fun for halloween, but in my life I don't have much use for them...I don't think they will go over well in the work place! haha

Review.Title: These are really weird. I don't think they look...
Review.ReviewText: These are really weird. I don't think they look good at all

Review.Title: This seems like a cool concept, but not very...
Review.ReviewText:
This seems like a cool concept, but not very real-life applicable. Maybe it would have been more fun if these came in an October box, so I could use them at a costume party? I just can't see myself wearing glittering gold lips to dinner or a bar. The eyeliner tattoos, maybe, but these are just too out there.
It was nice to get this in my box if only because I know I would never buy them myself.

Review.Title: These SUCK! I think the concept is cool but...
Review.ReviewText: These SUCK! I think the concept is cool but they didn't fit my lips and looked rediculous. FAIL

Review.Title: This was a product that was definitely "out there...
Review.ReviewText: This was a product that was definitely "out there" for me. I tried it, it didn't work for me. But, I like the idea and I think it would work on the right sort of person, I'm just not sure that I appreciated it like others would have.

Review.Title: Way to wild for this farm girl. Cute idea...
Review.ReviewText: Way to wild for this farm girl. Cute idea. Just way to wild.

Review.Title: I think these are just a little too adventurous...
Review.ReviewText: I think these are just a little too adventurous for me. I'd be more likely to use the stick-on eye-liners. I might be able to use them for a trip to the Renaissance Faire, but otherwise I don't think I'll use them at all.

Review.Title: I've wanted to try these out forever! It might...
Review.ReviewText: I've wanted to try these out forever! It might be hard to put on at first, but the three samples let me perfect it!

Review.Title: Made my lips horribly dry and wore off/started peeling...
Review.ReviewText: Made my lips horribly dry and wore off/started peeling very quickly... besides the fact that they are not very practical

Review.Title: This is a really cool product, and I think...
Review.ReviewText: This is a really cool product, and I think that it may have a place in someone's make up kit, but not mine.

Review.Title: I just was a little unsure why I was...
Review.ReviewText: I just was a little unsure why I was given this product based on my information. It was gold. I would never wear gold lipstick or anything of the sort. Maybe a different shade like a pink or red. Frankly Imwas unsure when I would even wear such a thing. But only because it came in gold.

Review.Title: It's a cool idea and I'm glad I got...
Review.ReviewText: It's a cool idea and I'm glad I got it in the box to try cause it's not something I would go out to purchase. A fun idea and worth trying.

Review.Title: This product is such a joke to me. None...
Review.ReviewText: This product is such a joke to me. None of the colors are wearable outside of Halloween. It looks tacky on my lips. It took FOREVER to take off and afterwards my lips were very dry. I used it once, just around the house to see if I'd like it. After 30 minutes of wear, I removed the product and threw the rest of it away. Awful product for me.

Review.Title: I just didn't get enough of this to try...
Review.ReviewText: I just didn't get enough of this to try to notice any difference.

Review.Title: Not enough product to tell how effective it actually...
Review.ReviewText: Not enough product to tell how effective it actually is, which also makes it difficult to answer the question about planning to purchase. I like Kiehl's, but I'm also already using a vitamic C product from another company!

Review.Title: Maybe I just don't have any dark spots other...
Review.ReviewText: Maybe I just don't have any dark spots other than a few sun freckles...but I didn't notice much difference. I do have product left, so maybe I haven't been consistent enough.

Review.Title: I do not have any large brown spots but...
Review.ReviewText: I do not have any large brown spots but tried it on a couple tiny ones. Product seems to work and is gentle on skin. Do not need at this time.

Review.Title: This was totally wrong for someone with dry sensitive...
Review.ReviewText: This was totally wrong for someone with dry sensitive skin but would be amazing for someone with acne scars etc!

Review.Title: havent been able to use this product long enough...
Review.ReviewText: havent been able to use this product long enough to say whether or not i would purchase it.

Review.Title: It was a little on the pricey side. This...
Review.ReviewText: It was a little on the pricey side. This is not a skin issue that I am willing to spend big money on at this time.

Review.Title: Well if I had dark circles maybe I could...
Review.ReviewText: Well if I had dark circles maybe I could tell if this worked...You are not doing these companies or your own any good by sending samples to people that can't use them. UNHAPPY with entire box this time!

Review.Title: I have used many things to remove spots with...
Review.ReviewText: I have used many things to remove spots with varying degrees of success. This is working but without the irritation that one might expect. I love it and will be buying it :)

Review.Title: Although my sample came broken, I love the Kiehl's...
Review.ReviewText: Although my sample came broken, I love the Kiehl's brand and am very excited to try this sample as soon as I receive the replacement. I think it would be great for me as I have some dark spots from old blemishes that I would like to get rid of.

Review.Title: I haven't really seen a difference and I'm not...
Review.ReviewText: I haven't really seen a difference and I'm not sure I really need something right now.

Review.Title: This is a nice product. Would have to use...
Review.ReviewText: This is a nice product. Would have to use for a longer time than the sample to see any lightening effects IMO.

Review.Title: I haven't noticed any change, but plan on continuing...
Review.ReviewText: I haven't noticed any change, but plan on continuing use to see. If so, I probably will purchase.

Review.Title: I'm still considering purchasing. I want to keep trying...
Review.ReviewText: I'm still considering purchasing. I want to keep trying it out to see how effective it is.

Review.Title: This stuff is amazing! I get the hormonal acne...
Review.ReviewText: This stuff is amazing! I get the hormonal acne cysts on my chin that leave a red spot for weeks sometimes a month or so (specially because I'm fair skinned). This stuff makes everything fade!!!

Review.Title: I don't have issues with dark spots, so this...
Review.ReviewText: I don't have issues with dark spots, so this is an unnecessary sample for me.

Review.Title: I have very clear face and never had a...
Review.ReviewText: I have very clear face and never had a black head. I passed it along to someone else.

Review.Title: After using it for a month, it has lightened...
Review.ReviewText: After using it for a month, it has lightened some dark spots on my face but not dramtically. I will contiinue to use it to see what long term effects it will have.

Review.Title: I don't have dark spots so this one was...
Review.ReviewText: I don't have dark spots so this one was a hard product to review. However, it did seem to help with my dark under eye circles.

Review.Title: I'm not old enough to develop dark spots. This...
Review.ReviewText: I'm not old enough to develop dark spots. This was pretty useless for me.

Review.Title: I just wouldn't buy it because it's so expensive...
Review.ReviewText: I just wouldn't buy it because it's so expensive and I only have one dark spot on my face left.

Review.Title: Again, I wish "Maybe" was an option for if...
Review.ReviewText: Again, I wish "Maybe" was an option for if I plan to purchase. Right now, I'm on the fence. Not sure if their is enough in the sample to help me decide one way or the other.

Review.Title: I have been using this since I got it...
Review.ReviewText: I have been using this since I got it and have seen absolutely NO improvement in the age spot on my face.

Review.Title: Does not seem to do anything. maybe it's for...
Review.ReviewText: Does not seem to do anything. maybe it's for really long term use.

Review.Title: I have multiple products at the present time for...
Review.ReviewText: I have multiple products at the present time for pigmentation problems and need to use them up. I may change my mind after using other products up

Review.Title: I don't have dark spots. I feel like this...
Review.ReviewText: I don't have dark spots. I feel like this product is not relevant and I won't use it.

Review.Title: I don't have hyperpigmentation but I can tell this...
Review.ReviewText: I don't have hyperpigmentation but I can tell this is a great product, it made my skin brighter overall

Review.Title: Love this stuff for my under eye area...
Review.ReviewText: Love this stuff for my under eye area - makes me feel like a new person!

Review.Title: I think it's too early to tell how well...
Review.ReviewText: I think it's too early to tell how well the product works, but I like the way it goes on my skin

Review.Title: I've used other dark spot correctors in the passed...
Review.ReviewText: I've used other dark spot correctors in the passed and was thrilled to try a new product. I love that I can get this through birchbox.

Review.Title: it cleans my face nicely, but i dont know...
Review.ReviewText: it cleans my face nicely, but i dont know if it controls acne for me

Review.Title: I love the way my face feels after using...
Review.ReviewText: I love the way my face feels after using the product. I have acne and I use the harsh acne medications on my face. So it was really cool that I was able to find a product that has one of the acne fighting components but is also filled with healthy skin loving ingredients. Thanks :)

Review.Title: I've been dying to try some of Juice Beauty's...
Review.ReviewText: I've been dying to try some of Juice Beauty's blemish clearing products so I was thrilled to find this great (and generous!) sample in my box. I've used it for a few weeks now and I have to say I don't really notice any improvements to my skin, blemish-wise. The product itself is a lot thinner than I was expecting, less viscous than liquid soap even, and doesn't lather at all, so I've been using it in addition to, rather than instead of, my usual cleanser. Someone with clearer skin might have better results, but overall this product is not for me. Thanks for the sample, Birchbox!

Review.Title: Really love that it has an organic juice base...
Review.ReviewText: Really love that it has an organic juice base and is full of vitamins.

Review.Title: Loved the sample size and how I'm able to...
Review.ReviewText: Loved the sample size and how I'm able to actually try it and use it to determine how much I like it.
